description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. "Out beyond the edge of the universe.  Far past any celestial wilderness you could hope to imagine, lies a vast ocean of impenetrable rock...". Test your piloting skills in this addictive one button action game.  With 4 different modes ranging from Classic to Double Rainbow.  The odds of surviving this game are 3720 to 1.  Have you got the minerals?
description.short: "Out beyond the edge of the universe.  Far past any celestial wilderness you could hope to imagine, lies a vast ocean of impenetrable rock...". Test your piloting skills in this addictive one button action game.  With 4 different modes ranging from Classic to Double Rainbow.  The odds of surviving this game are 3720 to 1.
